name: RetroBlazer
storyline:
A world shattered, a mission failed.

As a Pyramid Guard, your duty was to prevent this catastrophe.

Now, you awaken to a realm corrupted by Blight; a soul-sucking, spectral energy unleashed by an invading cybernetic Legion. With your kingdom shattered, your only hope lies in recovering the Totem keys: artifacts with the mystical power to banish the Blight - and keep it entombed for eternity.

But you won't face this challenge alone. The fate of your fellow Pyramid Guards is unknown - and some still roam these ravaged lands, united in their quest to banish the Blight for good.
summary: Take on the mantle of the Pyramid Guard, go up against the cybernetic Ark Legion, and rid the kingdom of a spectral blight. Combining the charm of Saturday Morning Cartoons and the bombastic action of late 90s shooters, RetroBlazer recaptures a golden era of frantic, fast-paced, first-person action.
